summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Public Warranty Check Page on Tenant Subdomains feature. All 12 backend API tests passed. All frontend UI tests passed for OrgWarrantyPage including positive and negative cases.
passed_tests: GET /api/public/org/{slug} - Returns org info for existing org (demoit)
GET /api/public/org/{slug} - Returns 404 for non-existent org
GET /api/public/org/{slug} - Slug lookup is case-insensitive
GET /api/public/org/{slug}/warranty?q=serial - Returns device details by serial number
GET /api/public/org/{slug}/warranty?q=asset_tag - Returns device details by asset tag
GET /api/public/org/{slug}/warranty - Returns parts with warranty status
GET /api/public/org/{slug}/warranty - Returns service history
GET /api/public/org/{slug}/warranty - Returns 404 for non-existent device
GET /api/public/org/{slug}/warranty - Returns 404 for invalid org
GET /api/public/org/{slug}/warranty - Returns 400 for query too short
GET /api/public/org/{slug}/warranty - Serial number search is case-insensitive
GET /api/public/org/{slug}/warranty - Response structure is complete
Frontend: OrgWarrantyPage loads correctly for existing org (demoit)
Frontend: Organization name and branding displayed in header
Frontend: Search input and Check button are visible and functional
Frontend: Warranty search by serial number displays device details
Frontend: Warranty status banner shows 'Active' with days remaining
Frontend: Device info (brand, model, serial, asset tag, dates) displayed correctly
Frontend: Parts section shows part with warranty status
Frontend: Service History section shows maintenance entry
Frontend: 'Organization Not Found' page for non-existent org
Frontend: Error message for non-existent serial number
Frontend: Search by asset tag finds same device
Frontend: 'Search Another Device' button clears result
critical_code_review_comments: Public org info endpoint correctly filters by slug and is_active status
Warranty search correctly scopes devices to organization_id for tenant isolation
Serial number and asset tag search is case-insensitive using regex
Response includes device warranty status, parts warranty, service history, and AMC coverage
Frontend correctly handles loading, error, and success states
data-testid attributes present on key interactive elements (search input, search button, result section, search again button)
seed_data_creation: Test org 'Demo IT Solutions' (slug: demoit) with device Dell Latitude 5520 (Serial: DEMO123456, Asset Tag: ASSET-001) was pre-created by main agent
context_for_next_testing_agent: Public Warranty Check Page on Tenant Subdomains is fully functional. Test org 'demoit' has a device (Dell Latitude 5520, Serial: DEMO123456, Asset Tag: ASSET-001) with 1 part (SSD 512GB) and 1 service history entry. The warranty is active until Jan 2027. All API endpoints and UI components work correctly.
